channel.title: Docs on RSE Midlands
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on RSE Midlands

item.description:
We are a group who use or develop research software and work in the Midlands area of England.

We are members of the Society of Research Software Engineering (SocRSE). You may ask ‘What is a Research Software Engineer (RSE)?’. You can find out about a variety of RSE roles in through the SocRSE case studies.

item.title: 8th June meeting
item.description:
When: 8th June 2022

Where: The Writers’ Suite, Edgbaston Park Hotel and Conference Centre, 53 Edgbaston Park Road, Edgbaston, Birmingham, B15 2RS, United Kingdom (map)
